Toledo WGTE The Greater Toledo Educational Television: .Foundation
Membership in the Foundation is made up of
educational insitutions and agencies interested in the
establishement and operation of an educational teleÂ¬
vision station to serve the Toledo area. Membership at
the time of application included fourteen such institutions
and agencies:
The six Toledo members:
Toledo City Schools
University of Toledo
Mary Manse College
Toledo Museum of Art.
Toledo Public Library
Schools of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Toledo
The eight members of the immediate Toledo area:
Rossford Public Schools
Sylvania Public Schools
Ottawa Hills Public Schools
Perrysburg Public Schools
Washington Township Public Schools
Maumee City Schools
Waterville-Whitehouse-Nonclova School District
Maumee Valley Country Day School
